titleInfo.title: Memorandum in Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga, 1967 August 10

mods.abstract: Memorandum filed by United States District Court Judge Frank Wilson ordering that defendents in the Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga case file a brief regarding their faculty assignment practices.
